snippet: The police in a southern Indian port city arrested the crew of an American-owned ship on charges of illegally transporting weapons and ammunition in Indian waters.
abstract: Police in southern Indian port city of Tuticorin arrest crew of American-owned ship on charges of illegally transporting weapons and ammunition in Indian waters; ship is owned by security company AdvanFort, which provides armed escorts to merchant vessels seeking protection against pirates in the Indian Ocean.
lead_paragraph: The police in a southern Indian port city arrested the crew of an American-owned ship on charges of illegally transporting weapons and ammunition in Indian waters.
